review: Better than any smart-tv interface and easy to use.  Every phone/laptop/tablet is now a remote in my house.
author: Justin M. Roberts "jrob"

review: Nice product, delivered on time, perfect conditions,work as expected with my ipad.  I recommend the product and the seller. No regrets yet
author: sue

review: not very user friendly.  Spend the $$ and get apple tv
author: Fred Peloso

review: Awesome!! It works even better than expected!! My college age daughter doesn't have cable, but now she can stream videos and T.V.from our Amazon account and she loves it!!!
author: Kindle Customer

review: Incredible device!  Installed quickly and easily.  Use to stream Amazon Prime videos to TV through screencast.  Both work great.
author: Amazon Customer

review: We love our Google Chromecast. It is saving us so much money not having to have cable.
author: Amazon Customer
